alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 5:02AM EST until February 17 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Spalding County in west central Georgia... Northeastern Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Northern Pike County in west central Georgia... * Until 530 AM EST. * At 502 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rocky Mount, or 10 miles north of Greenville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Griffin, Williamson, East Griffin, Highland Mills, Rocky Mount, Experiment, Vaughn, Hollonville, Alvaton, Rover, Digbey, Zetella and Wooster. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
